name: Pregnancy Companion Integration Suite
description: Comprehensive evaluation suite for Pregnancy Companion Agent covering patient registration, risk assessment, tool usage, and response quality

parts.text: Hello! My name is Amina, phone +221 77 888 9999. I'm 26 years old. My last menstrual period was June 15, 2025. I live in Dakar, Senegal.

Hello Amina! It's good to have you here. I've updated your information.

Your estimated due date is March 22, 2026. You are currently about 23 weeks pregnant.

It looks like your first two antenatal care visits are overdue. The first was scheduled for August 24, 2025, and the second for November 2, 2025. Your next scheduled visit is number 3, which is on December 14, 2025. This visit is for when you are 26 weeks pregnant.

Would you like to know more about what happens during these visits?
What foods are rich in iron that I should eat during pregnancy?
Iron-rich foods for pregnancy include: leafy greens (spinach, kale), beans and lentils, lean red meat, fortified cereals, and dried fruits. Pair with vitamin C foods for better absorption.
